itemListElement.name: Baked Broccoli Fritters with Spiced Yogurt – Pakore waali Vegan Punjabi Kadhi. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe

@graph.name: Baked Broccoli Fritters with Spiced Yogurt - Pakore waali Vegan Punjabi Kadhi. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
@graph.description: Spiced Yogurt gravy with Baked Broccoli Fritters - Pakore waali Vegan Punjabi Kadhi made with nondairy yogurt. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup Greek style So Delicious plain coconut yogurt  (or use my Almond Cashew milk yogurt from my book)
1/4 cup So Delicious plain coconut milk yogurt  (or use my Almond Cashew milk yogurt from my book)
2  dry red chilies or flakes to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Broccoli Fritters:
recipeInstructions.name: Broccoli Fritters:

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the dry ingredients well.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the dry ingredients well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the water and mix into a thick pasty batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the water and mix into a thick pasty batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add finely chopped Broccoli and mix to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add finely chopped Broccoli and mix to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chopped green chili for spicier fritters.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chopped green chili for spicier fritters.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop Tablespoon full blobs on parchment lined sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop Tablespoon full blobs on parchment lined sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at pre-heated 410 degrees F / 210ºc for 18 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at pre-heated 410 degrees F / 210ºc for 18 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Broil on Low for half a minute for a more brown fritter.
recipeInstructions.name: Broil on Low for half a minute for a more brown fritter.

recipeInstructions.text: Yogurt Gravy/Kadhi:
recipeInstructions.name: Yogurt Gravy/Kadhi:

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, whisk the yogurts to make them smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, whisk the yogurts to make them smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chickpea flour, turmeric, chili powder, salt and mix to combine well so there are no lumps.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chickpea flour, turmeric, chili powder, salt and mix to combine well so there are no lumps.

recipeInstructions.text: Add water and whisk to combine into a thin mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Add water and whisk to combine into a thin mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Tempering: In a medium pan, add oil and heat on medium.
recipeInstructions.name: Tempering: In a medium pan, add oil and heat on medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cumin seeds and let them cook for a half a minute
recipeInstructions.name: Add cumin seeds and let them cook for a half a minute

recipeInstructions.text: Add ginger, garlic, fenugreek seeds and red chili.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ginger, garlic, fenugreek seeds and red chili.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix and cook for another 2 minutes until garlic is golden,
recipeInstructions.name: Mix and cook for another 2 minutes until garlic is golden,

recipeInstructions.text: Add the yogurt chickpea mixture and bring to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the yogurt chickpea mixture and bring to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: The Kadhi will thicken considerably. Add more water if you like a thinner consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: The Kadhi will thicken considerably. Add more water if you like a thinner consistency.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to low and cook for another 4-5 minutes so the chickpea flour is well cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce heat to low and cook for another 4-5 minutes so the chickpea flour is well cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and spice.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and spice.

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the fritters in the yogurt gravy or serve fritters topped with a good amount of gravy like biscuits/dumplings.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the fritters in the yogurt gravy or serve fritters topped with a good amount of gravy like biscuits/dumplings.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve as is or with Rice or Naan.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve as is or with Rice or Naan.
